items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement a recommendation system that suggests products to users based on their browsing and purchase history using AI algorithms.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update dynamically based on the user's recent activity within 1 minute.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing compared to baseline.
Recommendations are personalized per user and not generic.
non_functional: Recommendation results must load in under 500ms.
System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent recommendation requests.
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA.

notes: User requirement was high-level; assumed need for personalized recommendations based on browsing and purchase history. Metrics and performance targets are inferred.
